fulltext:
CURICULUM VITAE 
Senior Software Engineer 
Full name: Vo Minh Hoang 
Gender: Male 
Birthday: February 2, 1987 
National: Vietnamese 
Professional overview 
Have 9 years of experiences in developing C/C++ on many different domains such as: 
substation automation system, video server and media streaming, embedded database 
management system, printer driver, high availability clustering system, content delivery 
network.  
Have 4 years of experiences in managing small size (5-10 members) team as team leader 
and scrum master. 
Have 2 years of experiences in developing JavaScript in web applications and visualization 
domain. 
Have one-year experience of experiences in developing C# program (WCF, MVC5). 
Have one-year experience of experiences in developing Android program for both mobile 
devices and Android TV box. 
Have a good communication skill in English. 
Can work well under high pressure. 
Career Objective 
Aiming to work in a firmly growing multinational organization that provides a dynamic and 
challenging work environment. 
Education 
Bachelor of Engineering 
Faculty of Software Engineering 
Hanoi University  
of Technology

Detail experiences  
10 months 
From 2018/02/01 
to 2018/11/30 
Company Name: DEK Technology 
Domain Name:       Content delivery network 
Overview:                 Develop new features for IPTV streaming 
servers 
Team size:                 5 
Positions:                  Scrum Master  
Responsibilities: 
- Manage team in agility way mixing between scrum and kanban 
method. 
- Pre-study features, organize team in breaking down and doing 
estimation. 
- Implement, review, test and release product. 
Using Technology: C, C++, Python, IPTV 
1 year 8 months 
From 2016/05/01 
to 2018/01/31 
Company Name: DEK Technology 
Domain Name:       Service high availability 
Overview:                 Develop and maintain functions of openSAF 
(an open-source software) 
Team size:                 10 
Positions:                  Developer 
Responsibilities : 
- Join implementing functions, fix bugs in many services: 
checkpoint, message distribution service, cluster membership 
service. 
Using Technology: C, Python, SAF. 
5 months 
From 2015/12/01 
to 2016/04/30 
Company Name: FPT Software 
Domain Name:       Embedded, Android 
Overview:                 Develop UI and setting application for Android 
TV box 
Team size:                 7 
Positions:                  Technical Lead 
Responsibilities : 
- Design application architecture. 
- Implement core functions in Android application. 
- Review source code. 
Using Technology: Java, Android. 
2 months 
From 2015/09/01 
to 2015/11/30 
Company Name: FPT Software 
Domain Name:       Embedded, Android 
Overview:                 Develop smart home applications for 
controlling smart devices. 
Team size:                 10 
Positions:                  Senior Developer 
Responsibilities : 
- Data object design and application architecture design. 
- Implement core functions in Android application. 
- Review source code of Android and Embedded applications. 
Using Technology: C, Java, Android, FreeRTOS. 
7 months            
From 2014/12/15 
to 2015/08/31 
Company Name: FPT Software 
Domain Name:       Printer Management System 
Overview:                 Develop printer management system that 
supports monitoring and controlling printers in LAN network, remote 
installing and updating PC driver and printer firmware. 
Team size:                 10 
Positions:                  Technical Lead 
Responsibilities : 
- Specify and confirm project requirement with customer directly. 
- Estimate project workload, schedule and tracking development 
status. 
- Design and implement core functions. 
Using Technology: C#, C++, MCV, WCF, JavaScript 
2.5 months            
From 2014/10/01 
to 2014/12/12 
Company Name: FPT Software 
Domain Name:    Japanese Sentiment Analysis   
Overview:            Develop Japanese text analysis tool for camera 
market. 
Team size:            3 
Positions:            Project Manager/Technical Lead 
Responsibilities :            
- Manage project work, customer communicating. 
- Estimate, analyzes requirement and design. 
- Design and implement functions. 
Using Technology: Java, JUMAN, KNP 
2 months            
From 2014/08/01 
to 2014/09/30 
Company Name: FPT Software 
Domain Name:    Automation Testing, Embedded, Linux kernel.   
Overview:             Develop media access and network benchmark 
tool for Freescale IMX6 board. 
Team size:            1 
Positions:            Developer 
Responsibilities :            
- Design, develop and test. 
Using Technology: C++ (user space and kernel space), Shell 
script 
5 months            
From 2014/04/01 
to 2014/08/31 
Company Name: FPT Software 
Domain Name:    Maintenance - Video streaming - Medical system 
Overview:             Develop new functions and maintain existing 
functions in endoscopy machines. This includes video streaming, 
encoding and decoding. 
Team size:             5 
Positions:             Technical Leader 
Responsibilities :            
- Design, estimate and develop new functions. 
- Review products from other members. 
Using Technology: C++, WinAPI, PostgreSQL 
1.5 years            
From 2012/10/01 
to 2014/03/31 
Company Name: Toshiba Software Development (Vietnam) 
Domain Name:    Web applications, visualization 
Overview:              Develop a web framework based on JavaScript 
and HTML5 with many kinds of widget. Develop many tools to 
support this framework such as lint tool, designer tool, Redmine 
plugin. 
Team size:              4 
Positions:              Team Leader 
Responsibilities :            
- Estimate, discuss with customer about project work. 
- Design and make schedule. 
- Develop main technical points. 
Using Technology: Java, JavaScript, HTML5, Ruby on Rails, 
Redmine 
2 years            
From 2011/10/01 
to 2013/09/30 
Company Name: Toshiba Software Development (Vietnam) 
Domain Name:    Substation Automation System - Windows 
Applications - Maintenance 
Overview:             Develop tools for monitoring and controlling the 
substation automation system. Each tool has its own function like 
monitoring electric equipment status, collect historical data, 
generating report. All tools are connected in substation network 
follow IEC 61850 standard. 
Team size:            2 
Positions:            Developer / Senior Developer / Team Leader 
Responsibilities :            
- Estimate and discuss with customer directly about project work 
and schedule. 
- Design and develop core functions 
- Do full testing from unit test to software system test. 
Using Technology: C++, MFC, IEC 61850 
6 months            
From 2011/04/01 
to 2011/09/30 
Company Name: Toshiba Software Development (Vietnam) 
Domain Name:    Video on Demand, Protocol, Video Streaming 
Overview:             Develop RTSP server for controlling the 
operations of other server in smart video server solution and directly 
connect to clients. 
Team size:             3 
Positions:             Developer 
Responsibilities :            
- Develop data collecting functions, administrator functions. 
Using Technology: C++, Java (bean), RTP, RTSP, SNTP, 
Redhat/Fedora 
1 years            
From 2010/04/01 
to 2011/03/31 
Company Name: Toshiba Software Development (Vietnam) 
Domain Name:    Embedded database management system 
Overview:              Develop new functions inside SQLite database 
to enhance functionality and performance of this database 
management system. The main enhancement is shared cache, split 
table file, PL SQL. This database management system can run on 
both Linux and Windows. 
Team size:              5 
Positions:              Developer 
Responsibilities :            
- Fix bugs from previous developed modules. 
- Join design and develop the PL SQL function. 
Using Technology: C, Ubuntu 
6 months            
From 2009/10/01 
to 2010/03/31 
Company Name:  Toshiba Software Development (Vietnam) 
Domain Name:     Super Charge Ion Battery - Simulator - 
Automation Test 
Overview:             Develop the simulator tool and auto test for 
SCiB. 
Team size:             10 
Positions:             Tester 
Responsibilities :            
- Design test spec and create test cases. 
- Develop automation test tool. 
Using Technology: C++, Win32API
